title: Wall Pocket, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: embroidered
Technique: applique of painted silks and painted paper plus embroidery on brown silk satin; couched gold-wrapped silk and strips of gilt foil plus attached gilt spangles
creditline: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Wall pocket in yellow silk with embroidery in metal threads and applique of silk of human figures with painted faces.

late 17th century. Medium: silk, metal

Technique: applique of painted silks and painted paper plus embroidery on brown silk satin; couched gold-wrapped silk and strips of gilt foil plus attached gilt spangles. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1950-121-55.
